title: Pyric herbivory decreases soil denitrification despite increased nitrate availability in a temperate grassland
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 365

Author(s): Leire Múgica, Xavier Le Roux, Leticia San Emeterio, Amélie Cantarel, María Durán, Jonathan Gervaix, Charline Creuzé des Châtelliers, Rosa M. Canals
